import heapq as h

def calculate_max_pleasure(n, m, k, p, matrix):
    l1 = []
    l2 = []
    h.heapify(l1)
    h.heapify(l2)
    for i in range(n):
        suma = sum(matrix[i])
        h.heappush(l1, -suma)
    for j in range(m):
        suma = sum((matrix[i][j] for i in range(n)))
        h.heappush(l2, -suma)
    ans = 1
    r1 = [0] * (k + 1)
    c1 = [0] * (k + 1)
    for _ in range(k):
        (x1, x2) = (-h.heappop(l1), -h.heappop(l2))
        r1[_ + 1] = r1[_] + x1
        c1[_ + 1] = c1[_] + x2
        x1 -= m * p
        x2 -= n * p
        h.heappush(l1, -x1)
        h.heappush(l2, -x2)
    ans = r1[k]
    for i in range(k + 1):
        ans = max(ans, r1[i] + c1[k - i] - i * (k - i) * p)
    return ans
